attributes.action: make illegal the traducement of ancient Britons when not supported by academically rigorous research.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ancient Celts have been seen, for two-thousand years, as savages - largely due to the writings of the victorious Caesar and attendant Roman historians keen on currying favour with him.  Indeed, Pagan people in general have been unfairly traduced as savages, bumpkins and, in some cases, evildoers at the hands of a monopolistic Christianity.  This has got to stop.
